original: śaive śaktiriti khyāte tīrthe caṇḍīti kalpite |
analyzed: śaive śaktiḥ iti khyāte tīrthe caṇḍī iti kalpite
vede veda iti prakhyāte namaḥ te vajrayogini

viśvarūpe kriyākāre namaḥ te vajrayogini
sattva dṛṣṭi virodhena gatā nā eva vidhāyini

nairātmya dharma gambhīra yoga dṛṣṭyā eka gocare
sat asat kalpanā atīte namaḥ te vajrayogini
śyāma pīta ādi nirmukte varṇa avarṇa vivarjite

viyat vayāpini
nairātmye namaḥ te vajrayogini

mahā jñāna vināśāya namaḥ te vajrayogini
iti guṇa yuktāyāḥ mātuḥ vidhāya ekaviṃśikām

original: puṇyaṃ yadavāptaṃ tena janāḥ santu(labhantu) pūrṇatvam || 21 ||
